nodes.bodyText: It's not clear why this is needed... why isn't the correct version being picked up from dd-trace-core?

nodes.bodyText:
It seems dd-trace-core is not an explicit dependency in dd-trace-ot?

https://github.com/drodriguezhdez/datadog-example

nodes.bodyText: It's not... it gets shadowed in since dd-trace-core is not published to maven.
